selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.unconditional
Class AbstractUnconditionalDistribution

java.lang.Object
  selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.conditional.AbstractConditionalDistribution
      selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.unconditional.AbstractUnconditionalDistribution
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConditionalDistribution, UnconditionalDistribution
Direct Known Subclasses:
Gaussian, Sigmoid, Table
public abstract class AbstractUnconditionalDistribution
extends AbstractConditionalDistribution
implements UnconditionalDistribution

Base class of all unconditional distributions, basically this means that the distribution can have no concept of parents

Author:
Charles Robertson
